pr_title: Register SignatureAlgorithm and KeyEncryptionAlgorithm for reflection in smallrye-jwt

timeline.message: Register SignatureAlgorithm and KeyEncryptionAlgorithm for reflection in smallrye-jwt

timeline.bodyText:
Hmmm. The extension is called smallrye-jwt-build but the root package is called smallrye.jwt.builder. It should be consistent.
It's not related to this PR but we need to fix the root packages of both the deployment module and the runtime module.
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText:
@gsmet Hi Guillaume - I referred to it though indirectly when I was adding quarkus-smallrye-jwt - the reason behind it is that .build. is in the list of the ignored packages in Quarkus - I think it may be a legacy so if removing this restriction is fine with you then I'll update the deployment package - note the subpackage name of the JWT build api is also .build..  I think going forward I may need to rename .build. to .builder. everywhere if .build. continues to be a problem. I propose to discuss it further on dev.
I was quite keen to avoid the typical .builder. in the package name but I may have to reconsider, I'm certainly looking forward to discussing it further
replies.author: sberyozkin
